name: Submarine.io
description:
Fight against submarines in three different scenarios :

  • Team deathmatch
  • Deathmatch
  • Capture the flag

If you are a good shooter, you will unlock submarines from 3 currently available !

The game has been designed to become multiplayer !

You can buy the songs 🎵 if you like them (I made them with ❤️)

You are free to use the songs in your projects. Just give appropriate credits.
However, you are not allowed to sell the songs directly or just by doing some modifications

Contact me if you have any requests or questions about that
